channel.title: Venice Film Festival Reviews on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Venice Film Festival Reviews on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘La Grazia’ Review: Toni Servillo Is Magnificent in Paolo Sorrentino’s Exquisite Character Study of a Powerful Man Taking Stock
item.description: The director of Oscar winner ‘The Great Beauty’ imagines the final days in office of a fictional President of the Italian Republic in this Venice Film Festival opener.
